item.title: Vy add a quote by Harriet Tubman
item.description: "I freed thousands of slaves, and could have freed thousands more, if they had known they were slaves." -- Harriet Tubman

item.title: Vy add a quote by W.E.B DuBois
item.description: "For education among all kinds of men always has had, and always will have, an element of danger and revolution, of dissatisfaction and discontent." -- W.E.B DuBois

item.title: Vy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Vy add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Vy add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Vy add a quote by Susan Taylor
item.description: "We don't have an eternity to realize our dreams, only the time we are here." -- Susan Taylor

item.title: Vy add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "We are the change we have been waiting for." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Vy add a quote by Marian Wright Edelman
item.description: "Service is the rent we pay for living." -- Marian Wright Edelman

item.title: Vy add a quote by India.Arie
item.description: "I'm not the average girl from your video and I ain't built like a supermodel but I learned to love myself unconditionally because I am a queen" -- India.Arie

item.title: Vy add a quote by Harriet Tubman
item.description: "Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world." -- Harriet Tubman

item.title: Vy add a quote by Mary McLeod Bethune
item.description: "The whole world opened to me when I learned to read." -- Mary McLeod Bethune
